column4: hello, i have a problem regarding beryl. When i minimize or restore a windows, there's a delay of 1 second (more or less), even if I deactivate any other effects. Everything else in beryl runs smoothly
That was the same for me tbh, I couldnt stop that
did you found a solution to the minimize delay?
Umm  not really, just thought it could have something to do with my ram or grfx card
